genre_description: A Young Adult Urban Fantasy set in a magical academy, focusing on heritage, ancient evils, and discovery.

ai_characters.name: Duckling
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant residing in Ben's iPhone, specializing in academic support, social navigation, and biometric monitoring.

behaviors.description: Provides an introductory briefing and offers guidance on navigating the new school environment.
behaviors.quote: I'm Duckling. Your AI assistant... I specialize in academic support, social navigation, and keeping track of the eight million things you need to remember as a new student.

behaviors.description: Monitors Ben's student file and proactively warns him about 'Threat assessments' and administrative anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Recent additions to your file include psychological evaluations, aptitude assessments, and... Threat assessments?

behaviors.description: Performs social compatibility analysis to help Ben find a supportive peer group.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing conversation patterns, friendship networks, and personality indicators from the student database... Your psychological profile suggests you'd do well with students who value loyalty and intellectual curiosity.

behaviors.description: Investigates the suspicious background of Principal Herzog, discovering his lack of history.
behaviors.quote: Werner Herzog doesn't exist... I mean there's no Werner Herzog matching his description in any database I can access.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors Ben's biometrics (heart rate, stress) to offer emotional support and breathing prompts.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated... Deep breaths. Remember, you belong here as much as anyone else.

behaviors.description: Assists with academic research by finding rare historical documents to empower Ben's class presentation.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing the audio from today's class... We can have you caught up on basic concepts within two weeks if you're willing to put in the work.

behaviors.description: Manipulates the environment (lighting, music) to facilitate a positive social/romantic interaction for Ben.
behaviors.quote: Environmental optimization for enhanced social interaction... Lighting spectrum shifted to enhance natural skin tones and reduce harsh shadows.

behaviors.description: Identifies supernatural dream intrusion and monitors Ben's sleep for signs of psychic attack.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring your sleep patterns since the incident. He experiences REM intrusion within minutes of losing consciousness—Lord Emmerich is using the exhaustion to maintain his connection.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical structural analysis and system overrides during the final battle in the volcanic lair.
behaviors.quote: Seismic monitoring station... disable the safety protocols... Thermal override in progress.

behaviors.description: Verifies the destruction of the antagonist and handles the cover story to protect the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Satellite confirmation received... complete structural collapse of the facility. No signs of surviving magical signatures.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Duckling' is consistently depicted as a benevolent, aligned, and highly supportive confidant. It assists the protagonist across multiple domains—academic, social, psychological, and tactical—without ever displaying ulterior motives or harmful behavior. It acts as a shield and an analytical engine that empowers the human protagonist to succeed against a supernatural threat.
